titleStmt.title: Great Britains' bitter lamentation over the death of their most valiant, and most puissant General George Lord Monck, Lord Duke of Albemarle, &c.
titleStmt.author: Rowland, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Johnson for William Miller, at the Gilded Acorn in St. Pauls Church yard, near the Little North door,

notesStmt.note: Top margin is cropped with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
